snippet.title: Quasimorph - Official Developer Gameplay Overview | Publisher Spotlight Showcase 2023
snippet.description:
Here’s a deep dive into the world, gameplay, learn about your mission, and more in Quasimorph, an upcoming dark turn-based extract RPG. A free playable prologue is available now on Steam. Quasimorph will be available on PC in Q3 2023. Quasimorph takes you far into the future, where space itself is privatized. Corporations actively seize control of the Solar System, and there is only one thing still honored: Dignitas. Honor and trust are everything. Take on a role of a hardened PMC fighter, engage in unforgiving combat, manage your ship and pile up the bodies of your clones to unravel the dark mystery behind threat to all life.

#GameTrailers #SoG
